works.title: Biocycle
works.text1: The project was to make the graphic identity of an ecological delivery brand, delivering packages using cargo bikes. To answer the subject, we created Biocycle. Biocycle is a responsible delivery company, which uses cargo bikes for its deliveries. Biocycle sees itself as a company that targets a niche audience seeking to reduce its greenhouse gas emissions. For this project, I carried out a competitive study upstream in order to situate our company in relation to others. I then worked a lot on the brand's personality and its positioning. Finally, I made mockups to put the brand in situation as well as the animation of the logo.
works.text2: To answer the subject, we created Biocycle. Biocycle is a responsible delivery company, which uses cargo bikes for its deliveries. Biocycle sees itself as a company that targets a niche audience seeking to reduce its greenhouse gas emissions.
works.text3: Pour ce projet, j'ai réalisé en amont une étude concurrentielle afin de situer notre entreprise par rapport aux autres. J'ai ensuite beaucoup travaillé sur la personnalité de la marque et son positionnement. Enfin, j'ai réalisé des mockups pour mettre en situation la marque ainsi que l'animation du logo.

works.title: Illustrations Montbéliard
works.text1: These are illustrations of a fictional city. This illustration is isometric and integrates 3 emblematic buildings of the city of Montbéliard.

works.title: Bug Days
works.text1: This project consists of creating the graphic identity of the BUG Days. This graphic identity involves the creation of a promotional page and a logo that we had to animate. The Belfort Ultimate Game Days (BUG Days) are 2 days dedicated to E-sport. During a spring weekend and as part of the Necronomi’con 2022, the BUG Days will see previously constituted teams compete against each other. Participation is open to everyone. At the heart of this event, a League of Legend and Rocket-League competition, broadcast live on Twitch.

works.title: Noise
works.text1: The Noise festival is a music festival held every year in Montreal. It's a festival where we will find a lot of artists who make experimental music.

works.title: Bresslin Suites
works.text1: Bresslin Suites is a hotel chain. I had to realize their graphic identity. Bresslin Suites stands out with hotel rooms where everyone feels at home. Bresslin Suites wants people who sleep in their rooms to feel like they are at home. Hotel rooms are not all the same, as one might find with Airbnb.

works.title: Alan Fletcher
works.text1: Alan Fletcher, one of the five founders of the Britwash design group Pentagram, was born of British parents in Nairobi, Kenya on September 27, 1931. Alan Fletcher was involved with typography, packaging design, signage, and corporate identity design. At Pentagram, his expertise and commitment to the integration of design and life contributed to the varied projects undertaken by the firm, specifically industrial design, site specific design and exhibition design.

works.title: Aldo Conterno
works.text1: Aldo Conterno is an Italian wine brand from the Piedmont region in the Langhe district, mainly producing Barolo wines. The winery is located in Monforte d’Alba, and Conterno was widely ranked among the main producers of Piemonte.
